numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In this graph, a higher percentage of 15-to-24-year-olds say that the world gets better with each generation.
3. In this graph, a higher percentage of people who are 40 years old or older say that the world is getting better in India.
4. In this graph, a higher percentage of people who are 40 years old or older say that the world is getting better in Nigeria.
5. In this graph, a higher percentage of people who are 40 years old or older say that the world is getting better in Morocco.
6. More young people say that the world is getting better than older people.
7. In this graph, there are more dots on the side of younger people than on the side of older people.
8. I wonder why some people think that the world is getting better.
9. It seems that history repeats itself.
10. I wonder why different age groups have different opinions.
13. In my community, different people have different opinions about whether the world is getting better with each generation.
14. These opinions help us see how we can help the world to be better.
